```{r 9.1}
p <- list()
p$A <- c(0,0,10,0,0)
p$B <- c(0,1,8,1,0)
p$C <- c(0,2,6,2,0)
p$D <- c(1,2,4,2,1)
p$E <- c(2,2,2,2,2)
```

```{r 9.2}
# convert each to a probability distribution
p_norm <- lapply(p, function(q) q/sum(q))
```

```{r 9.3}
# convert each to information entropy
# ifelse handles when q is 0, uses limit log(0)
# log(0) = -Inf
H <- sapply(p_norm, function(q) -sum(ifelse(q == 0,0,q*log(q))))
```
